item.title: South Kilburn Open Space - Malvern Road between Perrin House and Wordsworth House, 30th December
item.description:
Both bins are overflowing and urgently need emptying. A fly tip at the Perrin House bins hasn't been dealt with so rubbish from it has blown over the Open Space all week. A member of the public collected and bagged up the rubbish in the park yesterday and put it in the bins. Already homeless/drug users are going through the bags and scattering the rubbish again.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Malvern Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pile of domestic rubbish in neighbours front yard, 30th December
item.description:
The rubbish has been here for months and the bags are breaking with contents beginning to contaminate the whole area. It's a recently renovated building and they don't seem to have bins. My property overlooks the rubbish so I see it every day and it's getting worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
